personal.name: SkinHolder Desktop
personal.description: Desktop application to track investments in Counter-Strike skins, developed for Windows and Linux.

personal.name: SkinHolder Web
personal.description: Web application designed to track investments in Counter-Strike skins.

personal.name: SkinHolder App
personal.description: Mobile app for Android to track investments in Counter-Strike skins, developed for Android devices.

personal.name: SkinHolder API
personal.description: RESTful API for the SkinHolder app, acting as a bridge between different versions of SkinHolder and the database.

personal.name: Chrome Extension for CSWatch
personal.description: Official Chrome extension built for CSWatch that displays the website's statistics directly on the Steam profile.

personal.name: Interactive Portfolio
personal.description: Personal portfolio website built with TypeScript and anime.js, featuring multilingual support and responsive design.

work.name: Business Process Management Tool
work.description: Internal web application with a complex backend to manage workflows within the company and associated businesses. Supports task assignment, document storage, and status tracking.

work.name: Legacy Angular Portal Migration
work.description: Migration of a web portal based on AngularJS to a modern framework version. The portal allows clients and staff to check data, download reports, and communicate with the company.

work.name: Custom Automation Scripts for Clients
work.description: Development of PowerShell scripts tailored to specific client workflows, such as report generation, user management, or file manipulation on network drives.

work.name: SharePoint Online Automations
work.description: Automation of administrative and content-related tasks in SharePoint Online using PowerShell PnP. Includes migrations, site creation, permission control, and maintenance.

work.name: RESTful APIs for Products and Clients
work.description: Design, development, and maintenance of .NET APIs for both internal and external use. Provides services like authentication, data queries, report generation, and process management.

work.name: Client Dashboards
work.description: Creation of simple dashboards to visually display key client data. Information is retrieved in real time through internal APIs.

work.name: Post-Sales Product for Construction Companies
work.description: Internally developed product for managing post-sale incidents for construction firms. Facilitates communication between end customers, construction companies, and workers.

student.name: Final Degree Project – Full DDoS Network (Private)
student.description: Final project combining programming and cybersecurity. Implements a complete system: from the attacker's control panel and C&C server to the malware infecting the victims. The project aims to stand out through originality and a diverse, well-chosen tech stack.

student.name: SkinHolder Console App – Deprecated
student.description: First version of SkinHolder, developed when I first started programming in Java. Now deprecated and no longer maintained.
